channel.title: I have a virus? [Need Help]
channel.description:
So I started up my laptop, like I do everyday, just getting ready to browse the internet then right when I had the google opened, suddenly this message pops up: [img]http://www.bleepstatic.com/swr-guides/r/ransomware-reveton-moneypak/fbi-ransom.jpg[/img] Not sure if you can see the text, but it says:
You have been violation Copyright and Related Rights Law (Video, Music, Software) and illegally using or distributing copyrighted content, thus infringing Article I, Section 8, Clause 8, also known as the Copyright of the Criminal Code of United States of America. Article I, Section 8, Clause 8 of the Criminal Code provides for a fine of two to five hundred minimal wages or a deprivation of liberty for two to eight years. You have been viewing or distributing prohibited Pornographic content (Child Porno, Zoofilia and etc). Thus violating article 202 of the Criminal Code of United States of America. Article 202 of the Criminal Code provides for a deprivation of liberty for four to twelve years. Illegal access has been initiated from your PC without your knowledge or consent, your PC may be infected by malware, thus you are violating the law of Neglectful Use of Personal Computer. Article 210 of the Criminal Code provides for a fine of up to $100,000 and/or a deprivation of liberty for four to nine years. Pursuant to the amendment to the Criminal Code of United States of America of May 28, 2011, this law infringement (if it is not repeated - first time) may be considered as conditional in case you pay the fine to the State. Fines may be paid within 72 hours after the infringement. As soon as 72 hours elapse, the possibility to pay the fine expires, and a criminal case is initiated against you automatically within the next 72 hours! To unblock the computer, you must pay the fine through MoneyPak of 100$.
[hr] There is no way in hell that I viewed child porn. But I did try to download the Slender game on the piratebay.. I think I got this virus from there.. Why do I think it's a virus? Because it says I must pay $100 to get access back to my laptop, then all 'charges' would be dropped.. Does anyone here know what I should do? I know tom is good with helping people in this type of situation..

item.title: I have a virus? [Need Help]
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:8, topic:459430”]Wasn’t there a topic about this somewhere on this site? I believe there were instructions on how to remove it, too.

Here it is: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=556290.0

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=556290.msg4072214#msg4072214 date=1344459586]
So this is a virus that has been roaming the internet for the past couple of days pretty heavily. Just thought I would warn everyone <3

Here is a news article about it:

KSAZ

FOX 10 Phoenix - Breaking news, local headlines, weather, traffic and more. |...

FOX 10 is your home for breaking news, headlines, weather, traffic and politics in the Phoenix metro area with videos, photos and special reports.

here are a couple of (untested ) articles on how to remove if you get it

http://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/protect/forum/protect_scanner-protect_scanning/help-with-removal-of-fbi-moneypak-ransom-virus/f78b595d-c856-4766-b83e-f6b61091b493

BleepingComputer

Remove the FBI MoneyPak Ransomware or the Reveton Trojan

The FBI MonkeyPak Ransomware is a computer infection that locks you out of your computer and your applications until you pay a ransom of $100 in the form of a MoneyPak. This infection is typically installed onto a computer when the user visits a...


[/quote][/quote]
Woah, I didn’t realize how many people were infected with this :eek:

By the way, I finally removed this from my PC… It did take up most of my day, but at least I didn’t have to pay someone to take care of this problem for me.
Thanks for all the help/information

Read full topic

http://www.bleepingcomputer.com/virus-removal/remove-fbi-monkeypak-ransomware[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:

http://www.bleepingcomputer.com/virus-removal/remove-fbi-monkeypak-ransomware[/quote]
They are, I got my copy of ComboFix from them.

I’m pretty sure if you did view child porn they wouldn’t just let you of with a $100 fine

item.title: I have a virus? [Need Help]
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

I received a computer to fix which had this problem, installed mbam and it removed it perfectly. A note about this virus (err malware err not really sure what this is), its only active with a working internet connection from what I experienced while fixing it.

Read full topic

item.title: I have a virus? [Need Help]
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:2, topic:459430”]This was announced in Fox5 news and other news cast that there has been a person spreading a virus around so people would pay him 100 dollars and what not, it’s not really FBI obviously, they wouldn’t do that etc., so have fun, I’ve found a link on the first damn search, doesn’t hurt to search, does it?

http://botcrawl.com/how-to-remove-the-fbi-moneypak-ransomware-virus-fake-fbi-malware-removal/[/quote]
Thanks for the link… But believe it or not I did search, this thread was my backup plan just in case all else fails because I know some people here are extremely helpful.

Read full topic

How to remove FBI virus (Ransomware Removal Guide) | Botcrawl

In 2012 we discovered ransomware that was imitating the FBI in hopes to extort currency from unsuspecting victims. We coined the term FBI due to...

So I started up my laptop, like I do everyday, just getting ready to browse the internet then right when I had the google opened, suddenly this message pops up:

Not sure if you can see the text, but it says:
